justification: "The Mini-Mental State Examination was used to screen older adults for cognitive integrity and everyone scored within the normal range (score ≥ 26)."

measured_by: threshold parameter B of the racing diffusion model
justification: The paper defines "response caution (i.e., average of incongruent and congruent B parameters)", treating the B (threshold) parameter as the quantitative indicator of response caution.

measured_by: accumulation rate parameter v of the racing diffusion model
justification: "Mean evidence-accumulation rate, v, was parameterised separately …" indicating that the v parameter operationalises the quality or speed of evidence accumulation.

measured_by: nondecision time parameter t0 of the racing diffusion model
justification: The authors state that effects on the "nondecision time parameter was reflective of effects on the response execution time" making t0 the measure of response execution speed.
To capture bias, the model introduced "a 'bias-right' accumulation rate parameter, vbr … with 0 indicating no bias," making vbr the metric for quantifying prior-probability–induced response bias.
